meanings.definition: The last day of the year; New Year's Eve.
meanings.sent1: On hogmanays, people gather to welcome the new year.
meanings.sent2: We always have a big feast on hogmanays.
meanings.sent3: The hogmanays party was filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: The atmosphere on hogmanays is always full of anticipation.
meanings.sent5: The countdown to midnight on hogmanays is a thrilling moment.

meanings.definition: A celebration or party held on New Year's Eve.
meanings.sent1: Let's organize a hogmanays with our friends this year.
meanings.sent2: The hogmanays at the town square was lively and colorful.
meanings.sent3: The hogmanays decorations were so festive and bright.
meanings.sent4: The hogmanays fireworks lit up the night sky beautifully.
meanings.sent5: Everyone was in high spirits at the hogmanays celebration.
